node.title: 'Hugely important milestone': Black Ferns take vital step towards professionalism
node.description: Thirty women's players will receive significant pay increases from New Zealand Rugby.
node.content: ["It's been a monumental day for women's rugby in New Zealand, with the game one step closer to being classed as fully professional.", "Thirty contracted Black Ferns players will receive a significant pay increase over the coming weeks as New Zealand Rugby (NZR) prioritises the women's game.", "Halfback Kendra Cocksedge has had plenty of success on the field, but this is an off-field victory that's been years in the making.", "\"I never thought that in my lifetime, I could say I was a professional athlete,\" Cocksedge tells Newshub. \"The fact that I get to do that is really exciting.\"", "The 33-year-old has played world-class rugby since the age of 17, but has always had to juggle her training with full-time work commitments.", "\"It has its challenges. It's a pretty full-on day when you have to get up early at 6:00am, do your session and then go to work and have another session at the end of the day.\"", "But for some players that could be about to change, with New Zealand Rugby confirming new contracts have been drawn up that include an increase to base retainers, a retirement fund and more money.", "\"It's a hugely important milestone,\" NZR's head of professional rugby Chris Lendrum says. \"It's a really exciting one.\"", "It's understood the increase will see those at the lower end of the contracts make around $60,000 a year, with leading players earning in excess of $130,000.", "\"Now that we can make rugby a priority every day, I think the future of the game is looking really bright,\" Cocksedge adds.", "And there's plenty of work to be done before October's Women's Rugby World Cup, following a disappointing Northern Tour.", "\"There was a really clear line drawn in the sand in November about the standards that our players and management and support need to get to in order for them to be the best in the world again,\" Lendrum adds.", "\"Because we're not at the moment, but hope to be in 12 months' time.\"", "And there's plenty in the pipeline to extend the pay increase to Super Rugby Aupiki.", "\"Those players will receive payment for the time period they have to take away from work.\"", "A payment long overdue, but still worth celebrating.\u00a0", "\u00a0"]
